item.title: Gardener DNS Management for Shoots
item.description: Gardener DNS Management for Shoots Introduction Gardener allows Shoot clusters to request DNS names for Ingresses and Services out of the box. To support this the gardener must be installed with the shoot-dns-service extension. This extension uses the seed’s dns management infrastructure to maintain DNS names for shoot clusters. So, far only the external DNS domain of a shoot (already used for the kubernetes api server and ingress DNS names) can be used for managed DNS names.
